benchmark_details.name: BanglaBait: Semi-Supervised Adversarial Approach for Clickbait Detection on Bangla Clickbait Dataset
benchmark_details.overview: This paper presents the first Bangla Clickbait dataset created for detecting clickbait titles in Bangla articles, containing 15,056 labeled and 65,406 unlabeled articles, and uses Semi-Supervised Generative Adversarial Networks (SS-GANs) to improve clickbait detection.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a dataset and a model for clickbait detection specifically for Bangla articles, enabling further research in this area.

data.source: Clickbait-dense news sites and own dataset compilation.
data.annotation: Annotated by three expert linguists based on a majority vote.

methodology.calculation: Standard classification metrics are calculated based on predictions of the model.
methodology.interpretation: Higher F1 Score indicates better performance in distinguishing clickbait from non-clickbait articles.
